mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule_tb (staff_id, start_day, end_day, information) VALUES (#{staffId}, #{startDay}, #{endDay}, #{information});
mapper.select: SELECT id, staff_id, FORMATDATETIME(start_day,'MM-dd') AS start_day, FORMATDATETIME(end_day,'MM-dd') AS end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) as years, MONTH(start_day) AS months FROM schedule_tb ORDER BY start_day;

SELECT id, staff_id, FORMATDATETIME(start_day,'MM-dd') AS start_mday, FORMATDATETIME(end_day,'MM-dd') AS end_mday, staff_id, start_day, end_day, information, YEAR(start_day) as years FROM schedule_tb WHERE id = #{id};
SELECT mouth, count(mouth) AS sum FROM schedule_tb GROUP BY mouth HAVING COUNT(mouth) > 1;
SELECT * FROM schedule_tb WHERE MONTH(start_day) = #{month} OR MONTH(end_day) = #{month};
